name: Battle Riders
description: Battle your way to first place in this engaging combat racing game. It offers adrenaline pumping, high-octane action and a lot of fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / equivalent - 720p HD (1280 x 720) desktop resolution DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 / equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / equivalent - 1080p Full-HD (1920 x 1080) desktop resolution DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
